channel.title: Java errors and others. [READ ME]
channel.description:
I would like to take time just to say a few things about the recent posts that I've seen being made over the help section. So far today there has been over 30 topics asking about Java compiler issues, even though there is a tutorial in the "Server Tutorials" that helps with Java compiling errors.
I've also seen some Java exception errors, please could you start using the search feature or click [url=http://google.com]here[/url]
Hopefully this will be the end of the over occurring question.

item.title: Java errors and others. [READ ME]
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

No point in doing such thing, there should be one section like now. Just, people need to learn to use a specific topic before posting it anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Java errors and others. [READ ME]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Methinks they should create Help Subboards.
A different board for every kind of problem.
(There’s only about 7 types: Compiler, Text, Shops, NPCs, Money, Home/Death Spawn, Object Teleports.)
Maybe a few more.

But that would take them about 5 minutes to make new categories, and delete 550k posts, and sort maybe 100 into the boards, with the effort of multiple admins.

Read full topic

item.title: Java errors and others. [READ ME]
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

The help section is getting flooded with the same posts, I don’t think it’s fair that people who actually put effort into their server and get problems get left out.

Read full topic

item.title: Java errors and others. [READ ME]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Thing about the search feature: It gives you many many many useless topics, even if you use additional options. People who search usually come here. ;D

But people really should post their compiler probz in the sticky.

Read full topic
